build/include/openrave/config.h

説明を見る。
00001 
00004 #ifndef OPENRAVE_DEFINITIONS_H
00005 #define OPENRAVE_DEFINITIONS_H
00006 
00007 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(__CYGWIN__) || defined(_MSC_VER)
00008   #define OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_IMPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00009   #define OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00010   #define OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_LOCAL
00011 #else
00012   #if __GNUC__ >= 4
00013     #define OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_IMPORT __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00014     #define OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_EXPORT __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00015     #define OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_LOCAL  __attribute__ ((visibility("hidden")))
00016   #else
00017     #define OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_IMPORT
00018     #define OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_EXPORT
00019     #define OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_LOCAL
00020   #endif
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 // Now we use the generic helper definitions above to define OPENRAVE_API and OPENRAVE_LOCAL.
00024 // OPENRAVE_API is used for the public API symbols. It either DLL imports or DLL exports (or does nothing for static build)
00025 // OPENRAVE_LOCAL is used for non-api symbols.
00026 #if defined(OPENRAVE_DLL) || defined(OPENRAVE_CORE_DLL) // defined if OpenRAVE is compiled as a DLL
00027   #ifdef OPENRAVE_DLL_EXPORTS // defined if we are building the OpenRAVE DLL (instead of using it)
00028     #define OPENRAVE_API OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_EXPORT
00029   #else
00030     #define OPENRAVE_API OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_IMPORT
00031   #endif // OPENRAVE_DLL_EXPORTS
00032   #define OPENRAVE_LOCAL OPENRAVE_HELPER_DLL_LOCAL
00033 #else // OPENRAVE_DLL is not defined: this means OpenRAVE is a static lib.
00034   #define OPENRAVE_API
00035   #define OPENRAVE_LOCAL
00036 #endif // OPENRAVE_DLL
00037 
00038 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION_MAJOR 0
00039 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION_MINOR 5
00040 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION_PATCH 0
00041 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION_COMBINED(major, minor, patch) (((major) << 16) | ((minor) << 8) | (patch))
00042 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION OPENRAVE_VERSION_COMBINED(OPENRAVE_VERSION_MAJOR, OPENRAVE_VERSION_MINOR, OPENRAVE_VERSION_PATCH)
00043 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION_EXTRACT_MAJOR(version) (((version)>>16)&0xff)
00044 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION_EXTRACT_MINOR(version) (((version)>>8)&0xff)
00045 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION_EXTRACT_PATCH(version) (((version))&0xff)
00046 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION_STRING "0.5.0"
00047 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION_STRING_FORMAT(version) boost::str(boost::format("%s.%s.%s")%(OPENRAVE_VERSION_EXTRACT_MAJOR(version))%(OPENRAVE_VERSION_EXTRACT_MINOR(version))%(OPENRAVE_VERSION_EXTRACT_PATCH(version)))
00048 
00049 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION_GE(major1, minor1, patch1, major2, minor2, patch2) (OPENRAVE_VERSION_COMBINED(major1, minor1, patch1) >= OPENRAVE_VERSION_COMBINED(major2, minor2, patch2))
00050 #define OPENRAVE_VERSION_MINIMUM(major, minor, patch) OPENRAVE_VERSION_GE(OPENRAVE_VERSION_MAJOR, OPENRAVE_VERSION_MINOR, OPENRAVE_VERSION_PATCH, major, minor, patch)
00051 
00052 // if 0, single precision
00053 // if 1, double precision
00054 #define OPENRAVE_PRECISION 1
00055 
00056 #define OPENRAVE_PLUGINS_INSTALL_DIR "/usr/local/share/openrave-0.5/plugins"
00057 #define OPENRAVE_DATA_INSTALL_DIR "/usr/local/share/openrave-0.5"
00058 #define OPENRAVE_PYTHON_INSTALL_DIR "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages"
00059 
00060 #endif
